lexUnit.name: torture.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to inflict severe pain as a punishment or a forcible means of persuasion

sentence.text: The kingdom also uses the amputation of limbs as a punishment , imposes the death penalty , and has frequently been accused of torturing prisoners .
